#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
	ll l,ans(0),flag(0),flag2(0),diff,i;
	char no[100010];
	cin >> no;
	l = strlen(no);
	if(l<=2)
	{
		ans = atoi(no);
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	else
	{
		ans = 99 + 90*(l-3);
		no[0] = no[0] - 1;
		ans = ans + (10)*(no[0]- 48) + (no[1] - 48);
		no[0] = no[0] + 1;
		diff = (10 + no[1] - no[0])%10;
		for(i=2;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(  (((i-1)*diff+no[1]-48)%10)  < (no[i]-48)  )
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
			if ( (((i-1)*diff+no[1]-48)%10)  == (no[i]-48) )
			{
				flag2=2;
			}
			if  ( (((i-1)*diff+no[1]-48)%10)  > (no[i]-48) )
			{
				flag2=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if((flag == 1 )  ||  (flag2==2) )
			ans++;
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
